title: The Discerning Traveller: Let every new day broaden your horizons
description: The sixth captivating volume in The Journey series from Amazon bestselling author Craig Briggs. THE DISCERNING TRAVELLER continues his fascinating account of life, love, and adventure in Galicia, Northern Spain.Follow Craig and his wife Melanie as they strive to complete their building project on time and within budget. Establishing a holiday rental property is a risky and challenging business. A late booking is no joke when frantic preparations lead to a personal injury and a mix-up at the hospital ends in hysterics.Their journeys take them from Galicia to the Costa del Sol, England, and Portugal. They visit palaces and cathedrals, churches and castles, and a day trip to a ski resort is an eye-opening experience. Tour with them as they drive along stunning coast roads and circumnavigate breathtaking waterways. Food is a passion and wine their obsession. They feast on the gastronomy of Galicia, English staples, Portuguese specialities, Chinese delicacies, and Indian delights.At the heart of their exploits are the wonderful characters they meet along the way, from helpful neighbours to caring professionals; local characters to airline jobsworths.Heâ€™s done it again. Craig has crafted another page-turner that will have you laughing and crying in equal measure and leave you hungry for more.
author: Craig Briggs
